segments.en: Now, a key question you might ask yourself is what differentiates the new X420 line with our previous models?

segments.cn: 换句话说，是什么让X420从其他产品中脱颖而出？

segments.en: This is a key question and it's something I'd like to explore in a little depth.
segments.cn: 这是一个关键问题，我想深入探讨一下。

segments.en: Firstly, the X420 has a range of USPs that really make it a cut above the rest.
segments.cn: 首先，X420有一系列的独特卖点，确实让它比其他产品更出色。

segments.en: The first thing to mention is that the X420 is the first in a new generation of ultra-light laptop computers.
segments.cn: 首先要提到的是，X420是新一代超轻便笔记本电脑中的第一款。

segments.en: It is only 2 pounds, which compares very favorably with all our key competitors.

segments.en: In terms of computer performance, for such a light machine, it's very powerful.

segments.en: 4 gigabytes of RAM with an ultra-fast processor.
segments.cn: 4GB的RAM和超快的处理器。

segments.en: The most advanced video and sound cards on the market are installed with a crystal clear 15 inch LCD display.
segments.cn: 市场上最先进的视频和音频卡配备了清晰的15英寸LCD显示屏。

segments.en: The X420 really stands out as a next generation laptop.
segments.cn: X420确实作为下一代笔记本电脑脱颖而出。

segments.en: Compared with our previous X540 range, it really is in a league of its own.
segments.cn: 与我们之前的X540系列相比，它确实是一个独特的存在。

segments.en: Now, if we go on to look at projected sales for the X420, we can see that sales revenue for 2010 is expected to hit at least $20 million.

segments.en: Now, please bear in mind that this is only for the first year of production.

segments.en: Now, you've probably saw this acronym in the very first part of the dialogue when he said that the X420 has a range of USPs that really make it a cut above the rest.
segments.cn: 现在，你可能在对话的第一部分看到这个缩写，当他说X420有一系列的独特卖点，确实让它比其他产品更出色。

segments.en: Alright, so this is a very special acronym for the business world, and it stands for U, Unique, S, Selling, and P, Point, Unique Selling Point.
segments.cn: 好的，这是商业世界中一个非常特殊的缩写，代表U，独特，S，销售，P，点，独特卖点。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So, as the name says, a unique selling point are characteristics that are unique to the machine that allow it to be more competitive and to persuade people to buy it or to sell itself.
segments.cn: 所以，正如名称所示，独特卖点是机器独特的特征，使其更具竞争力，并说服人们购买或自我销售。

segments.en: Alright, so the new iPhone has a very interesting unique selling point.
segments.cn: 好的，所以新iPhone有一个非常有趣的独特卖点。

segments.en: It has two cameras, one on the front and one on the back.
segments.cn: 它有两个摄像头，一个在前面，一个在后面。

segments.en: So that really differentiates it from other phones on the market.
segments.cn: 这确实使它与市场上的其他手机区分开来。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So that is what a USP is, or a unique selling point.
segments.cn: 这就是 USP，或独特销售点。

segments.en: As we said, it's an acronym in the business world, but next time that you find the opportunity to use it, I'm sure it's going to sound amazing.
